markdown:
<title level="1" right="Rules">[Attacking with a Staff](/Rules.aspx?ID=3217)</title>

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 278 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Staves are also [staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=367) weapons. They can be etched with [fundamental runes](/Rules.aspx?ID=3167) but not [property runes](/Rules.aspx?ID=3168).
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
name: Attacking with a Staff
